name: gochatclient
description: ## Cloning a Project with Sub modules $ git clone https://github.com/vdntruong/gochatclient

scripts.pakpak: yarn clean && yarn lint && yarn fix && webpack --mode=none --env common --progress --profile --colors
scripts.pakwatch: yarn clean && yarn lint && yarn fix && webpack --mode=none --env common --progress --profile --colors -w
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn lint && yarn fix && webpack --env dev --progress --profile --colors
scripts.watch: yarn clean && yarn lint && yarn fix && webpack --env dev --progress --profile --colors -w
scripts.build:prod: yarn clean && yarn lint && yarn fix && webpack --env prod --progress --profile --colors
